CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__c ) , IF( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Account__c ) , IF( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Interim__c ) , "", ucinn_ascendv2__Interim__r.ucinn_ascendv2__First_Name__c + " " + ucinn_ascendv2__Interim__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Last_Name__c ) , ucinn_ascendv2__Account__r.Name ) , ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.ucinn_ascendv2__Full_Name_Formula__c )
CustomField.label: Remitter Name
